price: Hakika mimi kwenu ni Mtume muaminifu.
footnotes: Hakika mimi ni Mtume, nimetumwa kwenu nikuongoeni kwenye Njia ya wongofu, na ni muaminifu wa kufikisha huu Ujumbe.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
